sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Tents can be found in larger survival kits, and can provide protection from the elements for one or more people. Almost any large piece of fabric can be made into one if necessary, though most would prefer durasilk models with internal memory supports that assemble themselves.  Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>4</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Tent</name> <number>GEAR0001084</number> <price>100</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:34:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>258084b42f94a450e0f497eef699b65a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:34:38</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
